author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 14-year-old boy who was reported missing from Thalamuthu Nagar, in Thoothukudi, had been rescued by the police from Tirupur on Friday.

Police sources said the boy, son of a fisherman, was found wandering aimlessly near Old Bus Stand here.

When asked by the police officials, it was learnt from the boy that he came from Thoothukudi without informing his parents and got stranded here.

Complaint lodged

The parents had already lodged a complaint of ‘boy missing’ with Thoothukudi police.

The city police immediately informed Thoothukudi police and made arrangements to send the boy back home.
title: Boy rescued
